entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as the sender of the letter to Harry's address. She had squeezed the Dursleys' address in minute writing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the recipient of the letter from Mrs. Weasley. He tries to sound as though Mrs. Weasley's mistake was anyone could make.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as Harry's uncle and the Dursleys' father. He is touchy about anything even slightly out of the ordinary.

entities.name: the dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as a family that lives with Harry. They are touchy about anything even slightly out of the ordinary.

entities.name: the postman
entities.description: The postman is mentioned as someone who noticed the extra stamps on the letter and rang the doorbell.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley is connected to the Dursleys, although it's a distant connection.
Harry is a family member of Uncle Vernon.
